title: Government plans to bring forward online harms bill, AI minister says
description: OTTAWA — The federal government is working on online harms legislation, Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon said Friday. Solomon told reporters Culture Minister Marc Miller will bring the bill forward.
content:
OTTAWA — The federal government is working on online harms legislation, Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon said Friday.
Solomon told reporters Culture Minister Marc Miller will bring the bill forward.

description: Artificial intelligence is once again fueling a scorching tech stock rally, but the rising tide is notably not lifting all boats.

title: The Best AI-First Lead Generation Tools to Know in 2025
description: In 2025, lead generation no longer means manually building lists and hoping for replies. Artificial intelligence now plays a central role in finding, qualifying, and engaging prospects faster and more accurately, especially for B2B teams and growth-oriented businesses. Smart AI tools reduce manual toil, predict buyer intent, and automate outreach at scale, helping sales and marketing teams focus on converting high-value opportunities.
